HSReplay.net Premium directly funds the: HSReplay.net Premium directly funds the development of the site. We're sorry to see you go! If you are having a problem with the site, please<1>{" "}</1> <3>email us</3> or<5>{" "}</5> <7> reach out on Discord </7>, we'll get you sorted out!
All credit card information is stored an: All credit card information is stored and handled by<1>{" "}</1> <3> Stripe </3>, our payment processor. HSReplay.net does not ever see your credit card number.
PayPal plans cannot be managed directly: PayPal plans cannot be managed directly from this page. To manage your subscription, <1> log in to PayPal </1><2>{" "}</2> and go to <4> Manage preapproved payments </4>.

Here, you can connect multiple Blizzard: Here, you can connect multiple Blizzard accounts to your HSReplay.net account. This lets you sign in with any of them.
Make sure to sign out of Blizzard before: Make sure to sign out of Blizzard before adding another account. This does not sign you out of HSReplay.net.
We have automatically detected the follo: We have automatically detected the following Hearthstone accounts and associated them with you. You can see statistics and upload your collection for any of these accounts.
By removing this account, you will no lo: By removing this account, you will no longer be able to access its statistics. To recover it, upload some replays with that account!
As a subscriber, you have access to the: As a subscriber, you have access to the exclusive<1>{" "}</1> <3> Premium Supporter </3><4>{" "}</4> role on<6>{" "}</6> <8> our official Discord server </8>. Connect your Discord account here to do so.

Please<1>{" "}</1> <3>cancel your subscription</3><4>{" "}</4> first.<6></6> Note that you can keep using the site for free after cancelling, you do not have to delete your account!
<1>Deleting your account will:</1> <3>: <1>Deleting your account will:</1> <3> <1> Remove all your personal information from the site </1> <3> Unlink your Blizzard, Discord and Twitch accounts </3> <5> Unlink any application linked to your HSReplay.net account (such as Hearthstone Deck Tracker). </5> </3>

If you wish to delete your replays, you can do so<1>{" "}</1> <3>here</3>. </3> <5> Delete any billing data, or any records we are legally obligated to keep. </5> </2>
HSReplay.net is entirely usable for fre: HSReplay.net is entirely usable for free! Although Premium is how the site stays afloat, you do not have to pay to keep using it.
If you're encountering issues, we want t: If you're encountering issues, we want to know about them. You can contact us at <0>{emailAddress}</0> or <1>reach out on Discord</1>. We answer every email.

Your replays may be appear in listings o: Your replays may be appear in listings on the site.
Your replays will not appear in such lis: Your replays will not appear in such listings. Anyone you share the link to a specific replay with will still be able to view it, however.
Changing this option will only affect ne: Changing this option will only affect newly uploaded replays. You can always change the visibility for a specific replay on the replay's page.
You can upload your collection using Hea: You can upload your collection using Hearthstone Deck Tracker. Once you've uploaded your collection, we will show you personal dust costs and missing cards.
Enable personal Hearthstone collection f: Enable personal Hearthstone collection features on the site
If you want your data to be excluded fro: If you want your data to be excluded from these public results, you can check the option below.
